text: wadhkur -ayha alnby- hinama 'arak allah qlt eadad edwk fi mnamk, fakhbrt almuminin bdhlk, fqwit qlwbhm, wajtrwu ealaa hrbhm, walaw 'arak rabik kathrat eadadihim ltrdd ashabk fi mlaqathm, wjabuntm wakhtlftm fi 'amr alqtal, wlkn allah sllam min alfshl, wnjja min eaqibat dhalik. 'iinah ealim bkhfaya alqulub wtbaye alnfws
